ProductInfo.Features:
The Andteck Touch Tab 7X23 features a 2014 powerful Dual Core Allwinner A23 1.5GHz CPU for superior multi-tasking, ultra-fast 512MB DDR3 RAM for running apps, and a Quad Core Mali-400 GPU for smooth 3D graphics.
Google Android 4.2.2 (Jelly Bean) with Google Play Store pre-installed will give you access to 1+ million apps, games, music and videos. Micro SD slot alows you to add up to 32GB extra storage space. (4GB onboard*)
Standard 800x480 resolution Multi-Touch Screen makes reading and running apps clearer. Responsive Capacitive touch with 5 point multi-touch. Stream your favorite Netflix via WiFi.
Stay connected with Wi-Fi (802.11 a/b/g). Front-facing camera for video chatting, and rear-facing camera to capture that special moment. (0.3MP Front, 2MP Rear).
Andteck USA offers a 1 Year USA warranty with live customer service and technical support. We aim for top customer satisfaction. Andteck USA is the only authorized seller of the Andteck TouchTab 7X23 product.
ProductInfo.Name: Andteck TouchTab 7X23 Dual Core 4.2.2 Google Android 7 in Tablet PC, 1.5GHz, Wi-Fi, A23 [2014 Model] (Red)
